issue.title: [CI][R][Windows] Remove needless workaround for MSYS2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12352](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12352). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
repo.msys2.org is alive. sf.net may be fragile than repo.msys2.org.

See also ARROW-10202.
